#summary Staying up-to-date with TeXLive.
#labels Featured

The FreeBSD TeXLive repository is automatically updated each night at 5am CEST.

= Updating the ports tree =

Run `portshaker` without argument to update and merge to your local Ports Tree both FreeBSD _official_ ports and FreeBSD TeXLive ports:

{{{
# portshaker
}}}

= Updating ports =

The easiest way is using `ports-mgmt/portupgrade`:

{{{
# portupgrade -r texlive-core
}}}
